entries.title: 8,000 Southwest Airlines passengers were ready to take a chance
entries.description: Something doesn't feel quite right about this. And there are so many alternative technological solutions.

entries.title: Meta's Data2vec 2.0: Second time around is faster
entries.description: Meta's generalist network for speech, text, and images returns, but this time with a few tricks to speed up how fast it learns.

entries.title: Flying with a smart suitcase: Every major airline's travel policy
entries.description: Smart suitcases can help you travel smarter, not harder. But you'll want to make sure your airline allows you to bring them on first.

entries.title: Hey, Starbucks, how much should I tip for 10 seconds of service?
entries.description: Starbucks begins to embrace digital tipping. The whole thing seems rampant. But doesn't it make customers feel uncomfortable?
